entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 42 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
